description.value:
Frequency once per round

Requirements You're holding an unloaded hand crossbow.

You can fire off a single shot even when unprepared. You Interact to reload your hand crossbow and Strike with it.

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Repeating Hand Crossbow Training] feat, you can use this feat with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Repeating Hand Crossbow] to load either a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Bolts]{Bolt} or a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Repeating Hand Crossbow Magazine], but the speed means you can fire only one bolt, then the magazine jams. You must spend a 3-action Interact activity to remove the jammed magazine and clear it before it can be used again.
